creditline: The Olivia C. Coan Fund for the Georgian Room
description: Tray, silver, English XVIIIc  cat. card dims diam 5-7/8'   George I, square footed, with moulded rim and indented corners; engraved in center with a dove on a cabled bough.  Also included in this group are 50.11 and 50.12.
inscription:
Inscription

Engraved in center is an unidentified crest.
title: Tray
